DOMRectList.summary: The DOMRectList interface represents a collection of objects, typically used to hold the rectangles associated with a particular element, like bounding boxes returned by methods such as . It provides access to each rectangle in the list via its index, along with a length property that indicates the total number of rectangles in the list.

blockquote.para: Note: DOMRectList exists for compatibility with legacy Web content and is not recommended to be used when creating new APIs.
